title: ABC12 bracket busted | Video | abc12.com
text: ABC12 bracket busted Weather Alert ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT EDT FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Shiawassee, Genesee, Lapeer, St. Clair, Livingston, Oakland and Macomb Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to midnight Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow initially expands across the region through the rush hour commute, between 6 AM and 9 AM, where totals on the order of 1 to 2 inches are expected. Localized higher amounts up to around 3 inches are possible with any snow banding. Decreasing snowfall rates with some rain mixing in, or a lull in snowfall, is possible during the early afternoon. A secondary window for snow is then expected through the late afternoon and evening hours when an additional 1 to 2 inches will again be possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The snow is expected to disrupt travel throughout the day into Friday evening. Slow down and use caution while traveling. && Currently in Flint 25°F Clear 35°F / 18°F 3 AM 27°F 4 AM 27°F 5 AM 27°F 6 AM 28°F 7 AM 28°F Online Poll [ FanZone Championship: Kearsley v.
